game_description: Embark on a short adventure and assist a crew of pirates in retrieving a lost treasure. This short experience is part of a research project to develop novel interaction techniques for VR games. You are invited to share your opinion and experience in a little questionnaire after playing the game. However, this participation is completely optional. Features: - short and fun pirate story with innovative interactions - optional post-game questionnaire - completely free - collects no data
review_1: It was good, I liked everything about it, just pretty short, I don’t know if it’s supposed to be that short but was for me, took like 5 minutes to complete. Overall great game just short.
review_2: I loved the storyline and the art style was great. It flows nicely and the mechanics are pretty smooth. The only thing is that the link to the survey would be nice if it was somehow clickable on the oculus. Other than that this experience was great!
